dmca.title: Louis Vuitton Malletier
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 22, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Louis Vuitton Malletier


                                         <<greatfashionusplanet.pdf>> 







                                        June 22, 2005


BY EMAIL: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 N. Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Re:  Louis Vuitton Malletier

To ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.:

This firm is general counsel to Louis Vuitton Malletier ("Vuitton"), the
owners of the exclusive right to use the federally registered "LV", "LOUIS
VUITTON" and Pattern Design trademarks, among others.

We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by your
service that was selling counterfeit Louis Vuitton  products.

The www.great-fashion.us website was offering for sale merchandise bearing
one or more Louis Vuitton Trademarks (or bearing marks substantially
indistinguishable thereto) and this merchandise is COUNTERFEIT.

Pursuant to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.'s policies and the
requirements of The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") 1, please note
the following: 

1.        Signature of the undersigned set forth below.

2.        www.great-fashion.us was offering for sale counterfeit Louis Vuitton
merchandise and the offer for sale and the sale of counterfeit merchandise
is prohibited by federal law (15 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP. (for Louis Vuitton Malletier)
